name: Censoring Critical
text: Your critical hits mute your enemies. Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, the victim is unable to speak for 1d4+1 rounds. This prevents spellcasters from using spells with verbal components. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this muteness to 1 round. The DC of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus.
benefit: Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, the victim is unable to speak for 1d4+1 rounds. This prevents spellcasters from using spells with verbal components. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this muteness to 1 round. The DC of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus.
special: You can apply the effects of only one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you have Critical Mastery.
text_zh: 你的重击迫使敌人沉默。
benefit_zh: 当你对敌人造成重击时，目标在1D4+1轮内无法说话、这可以阻止施法者施放带有语言成分的法术。通过强韧豁免可将沉默减少至1轮，强韧豁免的DC=10+你的BAB。
special_zh: 除非你拥有重击熟稔（Critical Mastery）专长，你只能为一次重击附加一种重击专长效果。
